body: @Shorupsy dude, I'm not talking to you here, just at least ignore it if you don't want to come and reply all over again and also I'm sorry that my comment is long, did I stutter about "you shouldn't bother" by it? This comment is for that person who doesn't know how fandom works, and now here we go having a stranger bother commenting me, have some sense won't you? I'm not gonna do come and reply to you every single time

Its funny because asmodeus’ mom is associated with lust so it makes sense. Also stfu Divine Simp Bitch novel ass looking ass mf because I aint reading all of that shit mf gotta shorten it to at least one sentence. Learn from the best.

@Itzki soyoki I thought you learned your lesson but I guess not. Oh my devi, judgmental people these days. You keep calling faggot every other doujinshi, you really hate these hm? Then stop coming. You're calling yourself a fan but there are people who ship Iruma with the boys, let alone Lied-san with mobs from months ago. Jeez, you love attention do you? Good luck with people bad commenting about you. I've warn you three times, so there's no fourth chances anymore. Good luck surviving my dear Irumeri and Iruclara fan (I like this ships, but I respect other ships as well so I'm multishipper) though I don't really ship Asmoruma that much, since my brain switches to Lied-san with mother personality and his girl form so I'm wishing this doujinshi make them someday. MY JAZZU AND REEDO-SAMA ✨
NO! IRUMA IS NOT A FAGGOT!!!!! MAKE IRUMERI!!!!!!
